npmPackage.name: gatsby-source-sugarcrm
npmPackage.description: Source plugin for SugarCRM in Gatsby utilizing SugarCRM's Rest API

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Gatsby with SugarCRM

This plugin pulls in data using the SugarCRM REST API

Setup

Sample configuration for gatsby-config.js

{
      resolve: `gatsby-source-sugarcrm`,
      options: {
        endpoint: 'API_ENDPOINT',
        configOptions: {
          client_id: 'sugar',
          client_secret: '',
          username: 'SUGAR_USERNAME',
          password: 'PASSWORD',
          platform: 'base'
        },
        modules: [
            'MODULE_NAME'
        ]
      }
    },
